title: Microsoft Developer for CSP Licensing Management Application
description: Project Brief: A1 Technologies, a leading Microsoft consultancy and managed services provider based in Australia, is seeking an experienced Microsoft developer to create a sophisticated application tailored for managing and sourcing information on Microsoft Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) licenses for each of our esteemed customers. This application is vital for enhancing our ability to provide our clients with productive, collaborative, and secure Microsoft Cloud solutions. Core Features: The application must be capable of: Sourcing Microsoft CSP Licenses Information: Efficiently retrieve detailed information regarding Microsoft CSP licenses assigned to each customer. License Quantification: Display the quantity of each type of CSP license currently held by a customer. License Management: Track and communicate key dates, including the expiry and renewal dates for each CSP license, ensuring our clients are always ahead of their renewal schedules. Data Presentation: The application should offer versatile data presentation formats to cater to various user preferences and reporting needs. Skills and Qualifications: The ideal candidate will possess: Proven experience in Microsoft development environments, with a strong portfolio showcasing similar projects. Deep understanding of Microsoft CSP licensing and the technical nuances involved in sourcing and managing such information. Proficiency in .NET, C#, Azure Cloud Services, and PowerShell scripting, with the ability to craft clean, efficient, and robust code. Experience in developing applications with user-friendly interfaces and diverse data presentation capabilities (e.g., tables, graphs, reports). Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently to meet project milestones and deadlines. Excellent communication skills, with proficiency in English, to ensure clear and continuous communication throughout the project lifecycle. Knowledge of Microsoft 365, Azure Cloud, and Power Platform is highly desirable, aligning with A1 Technologies' core service offerings. Project Deliverables: A fully functional application that meets the outlined core features. Documentation detailing the application setup, operation, and maintenance. A brief training session for our team to ensure smooth adoption and management of the application. Application Process: Interested candidates are invited to submit their proposals, including: A detailed project plan outlining your approach to developing the application. A portfolio of previous projects, particularly those involving Microsoft technologies and licensing management. An estimated timeline and budget for the project completion. Any questions or clarifications you might need about the project.
